title: qt4 moc files are regenerated whenever cmake is invoked

content.raw:
This slows down rebuilding, since all the gui components must be re-compiled whenever cmake is invoked. To reproduce, do a normal build:
~~~
$ mkdir build
$ cd build
$ cmake ..
$ make
~~~
Then if you touch an unrelated CMakeLists.txt file, it will cause the moc files to be regenerated:
~~~
$ touch ../test/cmake/CMakeLists.txt
$ make
...
[  8%] Generating moc_qtpropertybrowser.cxx
[  8%] Generating moc_qtpropertymanager.cxx
[  9%] Generating moc_qteditorfactory.cxx
[  9%] Generating moc_qtvariantproperty.cxx
...
~~~
and then it rebuilds all the gui libraries and the executables that link against them.
